name: Wonyun Trench Run
description:
Wonyun outpost is under siege. The 12 remaining ships, one by one, must make run through a deadly trench filled with enemy fire and asteroids.

Controls:

  • Arrows: movement
  • X/V (displayed as X in-game): confirm/fire
  • Z/C (displayed as O in-game): back/slow move
  • P/Enter: access pause menu

View the game's repository on GitHub.
